靀字的基本解释

靀
méng
古同“濛”，（雨）细小。
古同“蒙”，覆盖。

靀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫紅切，平東，明。］
覆盖。

靀字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　靀； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1380第02
【廣韻】莫紅切【集韻】謨蓬切，?音蒙。【廣雅】靀靀，雨也。【集韻】微雨也。【玉篇】亦作濛。

靀字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
靀字的起名意思

暂无。

靀
Basic explanation of words
靀
méng
In ancient times, "Meng", (rain) is small.
Ancient Tong "Meng", covering.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Hongqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
cover.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　靀; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1380 No. 02
[Guang Yun] Mo Hongqi [Ji Yun] Mo Pengqi,? Yin Meng. [Guang Ya] Kou Kou, it's raining. [Ji Yun] It's raining too. [Jade articles] also as Mongolian.
